home.title: Welcome to Ubiq
home.desc: Ubiq is a community-run Proof-of-Work blockchain and smart contract platform powering decentralized applications, tokens, NFTs and much more.

slug.fallback: No {0} version available. Falling back to {1}.

sparrow.title: Install Sparrow
sparrow.conflict: Do not install Sparrow in the same browser as MetaMask, a conflict will occur.
sparrow.box1text: key sparrow equips you with a vault, secure login, and token wallet - everything you need to manage your digital assets.
sparrow.box2text: Sparrow provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. Ensuring you are always in control when interacting on the new decentralized web.
